SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT RES_NO , RES_NAME , ADDRESS || ' ' || D_ADDRESS "ADDRESS" , R_IMG , FOOD_CT , REVIEW_AVG , R.COUNT , NVL(TOTAL_REVIEW, 0) "TOTAL_REVIEW" FROM RESTAURANT R LEFT JOIN ( SELECT RES_NO, ROUND(AVG(STAR),1) "REVIEW_AVG", COUNT(*) "TOTAL_REVIEW" FROM REVIEW WHERE RES_NO IN ( SELECT RES_NO FROM RESTAURANT WHERE LOCAL_CT = ? AND DLOCAL_CT = ? AND FOOD_CT = ? ) GROUP BY RES_NO ) USING (RES_NO) WHERE LOCAL_CT = ? AND DLOCAL_CT = ? AND FOOD_CT = ? ORDER BY COUNT DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
